sources.autograph: Lucca, Istituto Musicale Boccherini, D.I.33, 'Sonata a quattro no. 7...' (for comment, see No. 171)

entries.notes: Op. 9 no. 6 of 1770 ('opera grande') in Boccherini's autograph catalogue.

sources.first_edition: December, 1772, Paris, Vénier: Op. 10 no. 5 (for title, see No. 171)
later_editions: (c. 1780), London, Bremner: Op. 10 no. 5 (for title, see No. 171)
(c. 1785), Amsterdam, Hummel: Op. 7 no. 5 (for title, see No. 171)
(c. 1785?), London, Preston: Op. 10 no. 5 (for title, see No. 171)
(c. 1790), Paris, Boyer: Op. 10 no. 5 (for title, see No. 171)

partial_notes: The page shows at the top continued publication information for string quartets, referencing various editions with opus numbers and publication details.
